price: Алар Аллахка кошуп, башка кудай жасап алган адамдар! Аларды катуу азапка таштагыла!»
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fa-alqiyāhu fī al-ʿadhābi al-shadīdi
